page.title: 09PURLEY CHASE GOLF COURSE
page.content:
The{Golf Course}at{Purley Chase has been open for seven years. It covers an area of 136 acres. There are about 400 members (Juniors, men and women). Fees are variable and are paid annually. The course is 'L' shaped and is the venue for a{Mini {European Tournament.
In 1985 a new{Putting Green}was opened and also a{Driving Range}and {Professional's Shop.
Soon there will also be five {Bowling Green}and a{Super Adventure {Playground.
Later it is hoped to add a{Hotel and{Swimming Pool.
